input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
Culinary 2116 Universal Mini Microphone with Omnidirectional Stereo Mic for Phone, Singing

Item specifications:
IT CAN BE USED IN THE FOLLOWING APPLICATIONS:SMULE SING,YOUTUBE,AUDACITY,SEESAW,BOOK CREATOR,SKYPE,TIK TOK ETC
Don't need batteries, easy to carry and collect suitable for the most of cellphones
It can be compatible with multi Singing software, and lets you have a good Singing experience
Do not charge the phone when the dsc of a microphone, otherwise there will be current sound.
Perfect surface spray processing technology
Just plug and record, anytime anywhere without external power Supply.
 light weight, high quality, easy to take along
It can be compatible with multi singing software, and lets you have a good singing experience.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Culinary 2116 Universal Mini Microphone with Omnidirectional Stereo Mic for Phone, Singing is a high-quality microphone that is compatible with a wide range of devices. It features a wide dynamic range, high signal-to-noise ratio, and low distortion, making it perfect for karaoke, singing, and voice recording. The microphone is also easy to use, lightweight, and portable, making it perfect for on-the-go use. It can be used with various applications such as SMULE Sing, YouTube, Audacity, Seesaw, Book Creator, Skype, Tik Tok, etc. This microphone is compatible with most smartphones and tablets, making it a versatile and useful tool for entertainment and productivity purposes. It is a great accessory for music enthusiasts, content creators, and audio professionals.
input_text.Response B:
The Culinary 2116 Universal Mini Microphone is a high-quality omnidirectional stereo microphone that is compatible with a wide range of cellphones and recording devices. The microphone is designed for high-quality vocal recording and is ideal for singing, video conferencing, podcasting, and more. The microphone is battery-free, lightweight, and compact, and is simple to use and carry. The microphone is also compatible with a wide range of recording software, including Smule Sing, YouTube, Audacity, Seesaw, Book Creator, Skype, and Tik Tok, among others. 

The Culinary 2116 Universal Mini Microphone is an excellent choice for vocal recording and content creation, offering high-quality sound and professional recording capabilities. The microphone is also highly versatile and compatible with a wide range of devices and software, making it an ideal choice for singers, content creators, video conference participants, and more. The microphone is also affordable and offers excellent value for money, making it an ideal choice for budget-conscious consumers.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A fails slightly to follow AIDA framework and lacks detail. Response B is very good.
